name: Old Soul
summary: Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way.
description:
Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way. You become trained in two skills of your choice.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
